articles.title: Cue Health rode Covid to a $3 billion valuation. Now it faces a rocky future - STAT
articles.description: Cue Health rode Covid-19 to an NBA deal, a $481 million deal with the federal government, and a $3 billion valuation. But a STAT investigation finds the company has struggled to deliver on its promises.
articles.content: It didn’t have the brand recognition of Abbott, or the billions of the medical technology multinational Becton Dickinson. Before the pandemic hit, Cue Health didn’t even have a product on the market.… [+354 chars]
